Headline: #54 Cicero, #54B South Cicero Temporary Reroute near Cicero/23rd
ShortDescription: 54 , 54B buses temp. rerouted SB: Cicero, Cermak, Laramie, 21st Place and 54th Terminal; NB 54th Terminal, 54th, Cermak and Cicero: near Cicero/23rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#54 Cicero, #54B South Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Cicero/23rd, due to police activity near Cicero/23rd.

Southbound buses will operate via Cicero, Cermak, Laramie, 21st Place and 54th Pink line Terminal including the normal route streets.

Northbound buses will operate via 54th Pink line Terminal, 54th, Cermak and Cicero.

Allow extra travel time.
